Bug Summary: If the user add an issue from designer account using issue tracker, the Tags Used widget is not displayed in the mobile view.
Description: If the user adds issues manually to issue tracker in the designer account, they have to mandatorily add tags to proceed further, but the Tags Used Widget doesn't appears in the mobile view to the users.

Bug Summary: Add or Edit Issue UI does not indicate the missing Sharing and Copy Issue Link options when blocked by certain browser plugins
Description: Steps:Log a few issues successfully as a part of an existing project and they are saved on the Issue trackerOpen one of the logged issues and notice the Share optionsDuring certain conditions, people might have installed certain browser plugins which may be blocking the social sharing options and the Copy Issue link options from appearing.The UI is not indicative of the reasons or the problems with sharing and Copy issue link options being blocked Expected Results:The UI must be indicative of the fact that the user is missing out on the Share options and the Copy Issue link options due to a browser plugin that he/she might have installedUsually, on Jira and ADO, the users can copy the Issue ID URL from the browser URL itself. This is more convenient to users since they are familiar with this kind of URL copying option since they might have mostly used the other project management tools and the Issue trackers on them.

Bug Summary: Normal text editor in the email share to be made as a rich text editor
Description: Currently text editor in email share section is a normal editor which supports only 500 characters. Make it a rich text editor to support table and as many as 2000 characters. This is to ensure that user can share the Issue list along with other updates to the team using the rich text editor. Refer to the screenshot of existing editor in email share.

Bug Summary: In Progress count shows negative value
Description: Please refer to the video for steps to reproduce - https://www.loom.com/share/e2357f49abac45c68e40e524156b803a Lucky Orange - https://www.luckyorange.com/v3/dash.php?#/recordings/play/210255-1625806710029-adb4891a33a0904b

Bug Summary: Why these fields are not editable?
Description: Hi Buugasura, I want to customize the popup how I want. The feature is good but I am not able to edit the fields which are already there!! example like feature name which I don't want. And I am not able to move those fields or delete them as well. It will be good if it's fully editable.
